titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for offering the band obliging heretors and masters for their tenents and servants, in some shires
Proclamations. 1688-03-13
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under Our signet at Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of March, 1678. years, and of Our regn [sic] the thirtieth year.
Armas 232; Steele notation: Faith, therein Reign.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
